TopicTitle: First a Big Thank you, a suggestion.

Articles.Content:
Congrats on the gigantic milestone you have all made. As on/off again fan of KSP1, I have been excitedly awaiting this release. So a big thank you from me. From time to time, I am going to try to give some constructive feedback on what I see and am thinking as I experience your game. I am working through your tutorials as I learn this game.  Great job so far on the tutorials btw.  I am looking forward to the addition of science and multiplayer. I know this is most likely a one way conversation with regards to feedback, but is there anything in particular you devs are interested in hearing about specifically?  Want to try and do my part and help where I can during this development. 

 

Edited February 24, 2023 by CaptainTXS
Im dumb, found the CC button.
